reviews.review_msg: Ledwidge is a very nice, reasonable man with a lot of knowledge and passion about the subject he teaches.. I think he does an excellent job
He mumbles too much so diffcult to understand what he's saying. Class was boring too.

Dr. Stanley is highly knowledgeable on the subject and it shows in her lectures. I appreciated her thorough discussion of the topics and using some very interesting examples to illustrate key concepts. She was extremely clear and very helpful. Overall a great instructor and I highly recommend her and this course.
She's a pretty good prof., the tests are focused on her lecture notes. You only need the textbook to go into more detail about what is in the lectures.
